entry.tran: （英国某些士兵在仪式上戴的）熊皮高帽
entry.def: A bearskin is a tall fur hat that is worn by some British soldiers on ceremonial occasions.
A bearskin is the skin and fur of a bear.

means.word_mean: 1. the pelt of a bear (sometimes used as a rug)
2. tall hat; worn by some British soldiers on ceremonial occasions
